articles.title: Art Performance Given in Phyongan Province of DPRK
articles.content:
Art Performance Given in Phyongan Province of DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus, the Moranbong Band and the Wangjaesan Art Troupe of the DPRK gave their music and dance performances in Sinuiju of North Phyongan Province from Oct. 4 to 14.
					 The performance were enjoyed by workers and peasants of major industrial establishments and co-op farms in the province, members of shock brigade involved in important projects, war veterans, inhabitants from all walks of life and youth and students.
					
					 Touching the heartstrings of the audiences were male solo and chorus "Song Dedicated to Mother Party" represented by artistes of the State Merited Chorus.
					
					 Orchestra and male chorus "We'll Travel One Road Forever" and "We Will Go along Road of Loyalty" and other numbers hardened the will of the people in North Phyongan Province to follow the party forever.
					
					 In such numbers as light music and serial songs "Oh Party, It's Thanks to Your Care" and female solo "We Call You Father", the artistes of the Moranbong Band sang highly of the Korean people's reverence for the Workers' Party of Korea which provided the socialist flower garden and has taken warm care of their life.
					
					 Songs including "Changsong Today" added to the patriotic zeal of the working people of all social standings in North Phyongan Province to build a paradise for the people with their own efforts.
					
					 Artistes of the Wangjaesan Art Troupe presented graceful and beautiful dances like "Dash toward Future" and tap dance "Young Days" reflecting the stirring reality of the country. 
					
					 The audiences sang and danced together with the performers and mounted the stage with bouquets at the end of each piece to congratulate the performers on their successful performance.
					
					 The audiences expressed their excitement after the performance was over.

articles.title: U.S. Is Not Qualified to Talk about Global Peace, Security and Civilization: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Is Not Qualified to Talk about Global Peace, Security and Civilization: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Recently the U.S. decided to withdraw from UNESCO under the pretexts of its dues worth hundreds of millions of U.S. dollars it has not paid until now and the UNESCO's increasing voices denouncing Israel.
					 The director-general of the UNESCO expressed disappointment at the U.S. decision, and envoys of different countries condemned it as rubbish aimed at pressurizing the body.
					
					 The U.S. had withdrawn from the organization in 1984, complaining about its discussion on the issue of establishing the fair international information and communication order and signed up for the body again in 2003.
					
					 When Palestine joined UNESCO in 2011, the U.S. reacted to it, not paying its dues on the pretext of its domestic law which banned the financial backing for organizations recognizing Palestine as a state.
					
					 The U.S. made a decision on withdrawing from the UNESCO in the wake of its exit from the Paris Agreement for protecting global environment. This is the height of the extreme U.S.-style egoism and arrogance as it does not mind sacrificing of the global peace and civilization for its own interests.
					
					 Such acts of the U.S. have become all the more expressive after Trump, whose belief is money, took office.
					
					 The Trump group is mulling denying the payment of dues to the UN which it has used as a tool for hegemonism and imposing the payment on other member states. On June 1, it ruthlessly violated the Paris Agreement, the fruit of the common efforts of the international community to preserve global environment.
					
					 When the U.S., an arch criminal of wrecking global environment, announced it would withdraw from the agreement, the international community branded its move as an "act surpassing the toxic gas atrocities by Hitler" and a "crime to annihilate humankind by making the whole green planet a room filled with toxic gas."
					
					 The Trump administration often trumpets about the issues of the international donations that they are "money contributed by the U.S. to the world" and "the U.S. enriches the world at the sacrificing of its industry" but it is nothing but a trick to cover up its nature as a brigandish empire which has plundered the world by abusing its specified political and economic status and to calm down the backlash of the international community.
					
					 The U.S. decision on a departure from UNESCO was made on an extension of such moves.
					
					 Now the international community unanimously condemns the U.S. for going in and out of UNESCO, a UN agency whose noble mission is to build a peaceful and civilized world by boosting the international cooperation in education, science, culture and other fields, at will in its own selfish interests.
					
					 The U.S. always revels in war and massacre around the world and is disturbing it while threatening and blackmailing other countries. This time it withdrew from UNESCO, utterly depriving itself of any justification to talk about global peace, security and civilization.
					
					 The Yankee logic of hegemony that everything should exist for it and be prey to it will no more get through to man with sound thinking ability in the era of independence as the theory is a pipedream and anachronistic sophism.
					
					 The crazy ideology and forces harassing world peace and civilization and threatening human existence must be eliminated from the world of human civilization, and from this planet. This is our stand.
					
					 All the countries of the world desirous of independence, justice, peace and development should never tolerate the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices by which it perpetrates all bullying acts under the slogan of "American first doctrine".

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts Trump's Hysterical Remarks
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts Trump's Hysterical Remarks
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago U.S. President Trump let loose such rubbish that the past "dialogue" with the DPRK proved ineffective but "one thing will work".
					 Earlier, he hinted "severe counteraction" to the DPRK, trumpeting about "silence on the eve of a storm" at the meeting with military officials.
					
					 Commenting on the fact, Minju Joson Sunday says:
					
					 Trump cried out for "total destruction and extermination" of the DPRK and its people, causing strong rebuff and criticism at home and abroad. He again let out such rubbish, only to betray more clearly his nature as an old lunatic.
					
					 His unsolvable rashness is little short of jargon of a cruel ruffian, political rogue much upset by the DPRK's toughest offensive against the U.S., and his mad acts prove rhetorically who is the very one that adds to fear of the American citizens concerned for security of their mainland.
					
					 Cowardly dogs bark much and a dog's bark will never make a camel go astray.
					
					 As already clarified, no matter what others may say and how tough the U.S sanctions are, the DPRK will not stop even a moment the efforts to beef its nuclear force until equilibrium of force with the U.S. has been achieved.
					
					 If the U.S. misunderstands the trend of the times and dares opt for a military provocation, its land will be immediately scorched by the DPRK's merciless nuclear retaliatory strike and its vassal force, the south Korean puppet forces, will have to pay a high price.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S., War Merchant and Strangler of Peace
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S., War Merchant and Strangler of Peace
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The Singaporean paper Lianhe Zhaobao recently reported that Trump is busy preparing for lifting arms embargo.
					 Trump is intent to open up markets for military hardware so as to fill purse of munitions monopolies and gain the political and economic interests, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is the war merchant and strangler of peace which gives rise to dispute and conflicts around the world in order to draw water to its mill regardless of the existence of mankind.
					
					 It is working hard to fatten its munitions monopolies and create the imbalance of force and the military confrontation in certain regions through arms sales and lead them to physical conflicts. And then, it attempts to send its armed forces under the veil of "peace defender" and occupy them.
					
					 Many countries are engaged in arms sales, but the U.S. is abusing it for world domination beyond the commercial purposes.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that war maniac Trump betrayed his intention to make money through the tension on the peninsula reaching an extreme phase.
					
					 Trump called for total destruction of our state and people at the UN arena and continues to bring nuclear strategic assets into south Korea and its vicinity, pushing the situation on the peninsula to the brink of war.
					
					 In this context he allowed Japan and the south Korean puppet forces to increase the quantities of buying the U.S.-made arms and equipment. His intention is to create the hair-trigger situation on the peninsula and shovel up money by selling the U.S.-made arms and equipment to vassal forces.
					
					 The U.S. arms sales means war expert.

articles.title: Korean-style Socialism Is Bulwark of Anti-Imperialist Struggle: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Korean-style Socialism Is Bulwark of Anti-Imperialist Struggle: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces are getting frantic against the trend of the era, but they can never prevent the cause of the DPRK, and victory is in store for Juche-oriented socialism the army and people have kept in their mind as their absolute faith, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The more reckless the imperialists go, the stronger the brave stamina and inexhaustible might of Juche Korea grow and the day will be hastened when the U.S. imperialists are driven into the helpless abyss of ruin by the stern judgment of history.
					
					 The important factor that the Korean-style socialism emerges ever-victorious in the final showdown with the U.S. imperialists is that this is the will of the people and ideal of mankind.
					
					 No force can conquer a country whose army and people have strong mental power.
					
					 Having grown corpulent in aggression, plunder and war, the imperialists have been possessed of lethal weapons, but they have no army and people ready to fight at cost of their lives for their system and their cause.
					
					 The Korean-style socialism centered on popular masses is the life and soul of the army and people and their steadfast faith.
					
					 Juche-oriented socialism which soars high in the East and shines as the beacon of hope for mankind will dynamically encourage the anti-imperialist struggle of progressives of the world for independence and advance along the road of victory and prosperity.
					
					 Though there is any raging wind and formidable enemies come in atacck, the final victory is in store for socialist Korea advancing on the strength of the great people.

articles.title: U.S. Hit for Its Move to Resume Nuclear Test
articles.content:
U.S. Hit for Its Move to Resume Nuclear Test
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- There are some sign of the U.S. moves to resume nuclear test. After Trump took office, resumption of nuclear test is called for again together with clamor about the modernization of outdated nuclear weapons and accelerated development of new nuclear weapons, timed to coincide with his remark that the U.S. should "increase its nuclear capability until the world "is able to understand the U.S. force".
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary denounces the U.S. moves as an unforgivable crime as it is aimed to threaten and blackmail the international community and dominate the whole world with nukes running contrary to the ardent aspiration of humankind for peace and security. 
					
					 The commentary says:
					
					 The U.S. is the one and only nuclear war criminal, the first country that developed nuclear weapons on the earth and inflicted a catastrophic nuclear disaster upon humankind. It is also illfamed source of worldwide nuclear proliferation
					
					 Reality proves that the U.S. ambition to conquer the world by force of nukes still remains unchanged.
					
					 The U.S. tries to justify its resumption of nuclear test under the cloak of "ensuring global peace and security" while shelving its hideous criminal acts of wrecking global peace with nukes and finding fault with others. It is the height of the U.S.-style shamelessness.
					
					 All countries around the world should become a slave of the U.S. welding nuclear stick or die. This is the brigandish logic of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal and the worst cancer-like entity threatening global peace and security.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Anti-DPRK Moves
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Anti-DPRK Moves
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Upset by the DPRK's rapid growth of self-defensive nuclear force and toughest offensive, the U.S. is now intensifying the anti-DPRK moves as never before, under the pretext of "threat" to global peace and security.
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says such absurd pretext is aimed to cover up the brigandish nature of the U.S. and inveigle the whole world into its criminal scheme to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK's independent nuclear development against the increasing U.S. nuclear war threat is a legitimate right to self-defense no one can criticize, it stresses, adding:
					
					 The DPRK's state nuclear force is the war deterrent to put an end to the U.S. nuclear threat and prevent its military invasion from A to Z, and the final goal is to ensure equilibrium of force with the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. and its vassal forces are making desperate efforts to block the advance of the DPRK, talking about "threat" to global peace and security. But such moves go to harden the faith that the road chosen by the DPRK is quite right and it should take to this road to the last.
					
					 The DPRK, as a responsible nuclear weapons state, will as ever honestly discharge its mission and duty for preserving peace and security of mankind.

articles.title: New Website Opened in Nepal
articles.content:
New Website Opened in Nepal
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The internet homepage Juche-Nepal was opened on the occasions of the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and its 72nd birthday.
					 Its opening event took place on October 4.
					
					 Present there were personages of political parties, organizations and media of Nepal and the DPRK ambassador to the country and his embassy officials.
					
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 A congratulatory message to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event.

articles.title: Significant Days of DPRK Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Significant Days of DPRK Marked in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd birthday and the 91st formation anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 Korean book, photo and fine art exhibition was held in Indonesia, celebration meeting and book and photo exhibition in Mexico and book, photo and fine art exhibition in Bulgaria between September 14 and October 7.
					
					 On display at their venues were photos showing the revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also their works, books and photos introducing the reality of the DPRK and fine art pieces showing the creative talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The director for East Asian and Pacific Affairs of the Indonesian Foreign Ministry expressed the resolve to further deepen the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 The chairman of the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association referred to the proud history of the WPK and the fact that the Korean army and people under the leadership of the Party have pushed ahead with socialist construction, smashing all sorts of challenges of the hostile forces.
					
					 The chief of the DPRK cultural and information centre in Vratsa City of Bulgaria said that the exhibition would be greatly conducive to deepening the mutual understating between the peoples of the two countries and developing their cooperative relations in culture.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ACNC) -- Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y primer ministro de Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, averiguo en el terreno el estado de construccion del alto horno segun el metodo de inyeccion de oxigeno del Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek.
					En varios lugares el premier estimulo a los funcionarios y obreros quienes impulsan la obra en etapa final.
					
					En la reunion consultiva sostenida en el terreno, el se refirio a la necesidad de concentrar las fuerzas en la construccion de alto horno en etapa final y en la obra para la instalacion del separador de aire de gran tamano y busco las medidas para solucionar los problemas que se presentan en la produccion de hierro Juche.
					
					Por otra parte, Pak se cercioro en detallas del estado de produccion de la Aceria Chongjin y la Fabrica de Hierro de Aleacion de Puryong y discutio los temas para incrementar al maximo la produccion del acero Juche y el hierro de aleacion.

articles.title: Terminada la gira de entidades artisticas famosas en provincia de Phyong-an del Norte
articles.content:
Terminada la gira de entidades artisticas famosas en provincia de Phyong-an del Norte
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ACNC) -- Se ofrecio desde el dia 4 hasta el 14 en la ciudad de Sinuiju la funcion musical y coreografica del Coro Estatal Benemerito, la Banda Moranbong y el Conjunto Artistico Wangjaesan.
					Vieron la funcion los obreros y trabajadores agricolas de las fabricas, empresas y granjas cooperativas principales, los miembros de las brigadas de construccion, los veteranos de guerra, los trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte. 
					
					Los artistas del Coro Estatal Benemerito describieron bien el solo y coro masculinos "Cancion al Partido-Madre". 
					
					El solo y coro masculinos "!Adelante, Corea, siguiendo la linea de desarrollo paralelo!", la musica orquestal y el coro masculino "Iremos siempre por nuestro camino" y otras piezas aumentaron mas el fervor de los habitantes locales de seguir siempre al Partido. 
					
					Las ejecutantes de la Banda Moranbong expresaron la anoranza al Partido-Madre que cuida siempre del pueblo. 
					
					Las canciones como "Tejedora de seda de Nyongbyon" y "Changsong de hoy" aumentaron el patriotismo de los trabajadores de diferentes estratos de la provincia quienes construyen con sus propias fuerzas el paraiso del pueblo en su tierra natal. 
					
					Los bailadores del Conjunto Artistico Wangjaesan pusieron en la escena la danza "Corramos hacia el futuro" y la danza Tap "Juventud" que reflejan la realidad de la patria en desarrollo vertiginoso. 
					
					Los espectadores cantaron y bailaron junto con los ejecutantes y les felicitaron dandoles las ramas de flores y expresando sus impresiones.

articles.title: EE.UU. perdio completamente la calidad de hablar de paz, seguridad y civilizacion, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
EE.UU. perdio completamente la calidad de hablar de paz, seguridad y civilizacion, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ACNC) -- EE.UU. tomo la resolucion de retirarse de la Organizacion de las Naciones Unidas para la Educacion, la Ciencia y la Cultura (UNESCO) tomando como pretexto la cuota de cientos de millones de US$ de su pais no pagada hasta la fecha y las voces de denuncia sobre Israel que se aumentan en esta organizacion internacional.
					Al respecto, el director general de la UNESCO expreso lastima y los representantes de varios paises lo repudian como una absurdidad para ejercer la presion sobre esta organizacion internacional. 
					
					Ya en 1984, EE.UU. retiro de la UNESCO expresando su disgusto sobre el debate del establecimiento de un imparcial orden mundial de informaciones y comunicaciones y reingreso en 2003. 
					
					Cuando Palestina ingreso en el ano 2011 en la UNESCO, suspendio el pago de su cuota pretextando la ley nacional que prohibe el apoyo financiero a una organizacion internacional que reconoce a Palestina como un Estado.
					
					La retirada de EE.UU. de la Convencion de Paris para la proteccion del medioambiente del globo terraqueo y de la UNESCO es el climax del egoismo extremado y la arrogancia de EE.UU. que sacrifica hasta la paz mundial y la civilizacion para satisfacer sus propios intereses.
					
					El atributo egoista y soberbio de EE.UU. se expresa mas despues del mandato de Trump que cuenta lo todo con dinero.
					
					Los compinches de Trump niegan el pago de su cuota a la ONU utilizada hasta la fecha como un aparato de su hegemonia y pretenden imponerlo a otros paises miembros.
					
					Y el primero de junio pisotearon brutalmente la Convencion de Paris, fruto de los esfuerzos comunes de la sociedad internacional por conservar el medioambiente del orbe.
					
					EE.UU., rey de la destruccion del ambiente de la Tierra, declaro el retiro del convenio, lo cual fue ratificado por la sociedad internacional como "acto que supera la atrocidad del gas veneno de Hitler" y "crimen para exterminar toda la humanidad convirtiendo la Tierra verde en la sala del gas veneno".
					
					Al hablar del problema de la contribucion internacional la administracion de Trump suele a decir que es el "dinero que EE.UU. contribuyo al mundo" y "acto que hizo enriquecer el mundo sacrificando la industria norteamericana". Pero, esto no pasa de ser un engano para encubrir su naturaleza del imperio gangsteril que ha venido saqueando todo el mundo abusando de su especial posicion politico-economico y calmar la protesta de la sociedad internacional.
					
					Tambien, la decision de EE.UU. por la retirada de UNESCO fue ejecutada en esta interrelacion.
					
					Ahora, la sociedad internacional condena al unisono a EE.UU. que entra y sale arbitrariamente segun su objeto egoista en UNESCO que tiene la noble mision de construir un mundo pacifico y civilizado fortaleciendo la colaboracion internacional en los dominios como educacion, la ciencia y la cultura.
					
					Ese pais americano, que se dedica solo a la guerra y el homicidio en todas partes y crea tumultos amenazando y chantajeando a otros paises, se retiro recientemente de la UNESCO perdiendo completamente la calidad de hablar de la paz, seguridad y civilizacion del mundo.
					
					La doctrina yanqui de que todo debe existirse solo por EE.UU. y servirse de la comida de este es la ilusion y sofisteria anacronicas y no puede ser aceptada jamas ante la epoca independiente y el pensamiento sano de la humanidad.
					
					La idea y las fuerzas locas que destruyen la paz y la civilizacion del mundo y amenazan la misma existencia del ser humano deben ser expulsadas de la sociedad civilizada de la humanidad y de este globo terraqueo. Esto es nuestra insistencia.
					
					Todos los paises del mundo aspirantes a la independencia, la justicia, la paz y el desarrollo no deben perdonar el despotismo y la arbitrariedad de EE.UU. que no vacila en perpetrar los actos gansgteriles de todo tipo presentando la "idea de dar prioridad a EE.UU."

articles.title: Minju Joson condena palabras furiosas de Trump
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena palabras furiosas de Trump
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el presidente estadounidense Trump dijo que en el pasado no hubo efectos en el "dialogo con el Norte" y "sera fructifero solo un remedio", y suplico creerle.
					Con anterioridad, sostuvo una conspiracion con sus complices de la capa militar, ocasion en la cual se refirio a la "tranquilidad en visperas de la tempestad" e insinuo la "reaccion severa" a la RPDC.
					
					Tales palabras histericas ponen mas en relieve la fachada del fanatico viejo quien se hace objeto de fuerte condena tanto en la sociedad internacional como en EE.UU. por sus disparates sobre la "destruccion total" y la "exterminacion" de la RPDC.
					
					Asi burla el rotativo Minju Joson en un comentario divulgado el dia 15, y prosigue:
					
					La imprudencia de Trump no pasa de ser una queja de un gangster y bribon politico que no sabe que hacer ante la ofensiva intransigente anti-EE.UU. de la RPDC, y demuestra quien da el temor a la poblacion estadounidense que esta preocupando de la seguridad de su propio territorio.
					
					La caravana continua su marcha sin prestar oidos al perro que ladra.
					
					Digan lo que digan, la RPDC nunca parara ni un momento los esfuerzos por el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares hasta que tenga equilibrio de la fuerza con EE.UU.
					
					Si EE.UU. se atreve a tomar el camino de la provocacion militar, su territorio principal se convertira de inmediato en el monton de cenizas por el despiadado ataque nuclear de represalia de la RPDC, y los titeres surcoreanos tambien pagaran caro por seguir a su amo norteamericano.
